page.title: 04Farming
page.content: There are{five farms}in or around the village of Stogumber.The{largest } of these is a{600 acre sheep farm at {Escott}which keeps 500 sheep.Their main crops are wheat and barley. {Hill farm is a 340 acre dairy farm with 90 cows producing about 500,000 litres of milk per year.They grow mainly wheat,barley and oats. Another sheep farm is a{130 acre } farm at{Higher Preston.}This farm grows winter and spring barley. {Wood farm}is{153 acres}and grows mainly wheat and barley. The{smallest}of the five farms is{Hall Farm}which is{75 acres.}This farm grows barley and keeps poultry. All five farms keep cows for beef and produce hay which they use to feed their animals in the winter.They all have tractors and a variety of farm implements.
